text: Jonathan Dale Crenshaw (1972 â€“ May 12, 2023) was an American artist with no arms from Florida. He showed his art on the street. He was shown in a pizza review. == Arrest == In 2018, he was stopped by police for attacking a tourist with scissors and claims he was trying to protect himself and he was let go. ==Death== Crenshaw died on May 12, 2023. His death wasn't reported for almost a year. == References == Category:American artists Category:People from Florida Category:1972 births Category:2023 deaths
title: Jonathan Crenshaw
